description:
Not happy with a passive-aggressive "ping-ping-ping" to announce yourself? This bell sounds a tone that says, "respectfully requesting that you put down your phone and tune into the world around you, now, here, and in this moment we share." And says all that with a pleasant and distinctive ring.

  • Small fits bars with 22.2mm diameters only
  • Large fits bars with 23.8 to 31.8mm diameters
  • Cables fits nicely in the dedicated groove of the bell, keeping them organized
  • Low profile is stealthy enough for road bikes
  • Slots easily into a small space to keep your grips, brakes and shifter right where they are
name: Knog Oi Bell Aluminium
